flashmetering: Auto, Manual flash, Integrated Speedlite Transmitter
autofocussystem: TTL-CT-SIR with a dedicated CMOS sensor
connectivity: Hi-Speed USB, Video output (PAL/ NTSC) (integrated with USB terminal), HDMI mini output (HDMI-CEC compatible), External microphone (3.5mm Stereo mini jack)
meteringsystem: TTL full aperture metering with 63-zone SPC
exposuremodes: Program AE, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual, and 11 Scene Modes
supportedflashmemory: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card
